title: The temporary transit camp/transit accommodation shall be provided within DNA or nearby lands with prior approval of DRP(SRA) and if need be on the area of statutory open space to be left in accordance with Regulation No
clause_text: The temporary transit camp/transit accommodation shall be provided within DNA or nearby lands with prior approval of DRP(SRA) and if need be on the area of statutory open space to be left in accordance with Regulation No. 27 on the plot.
